sourcesContent: import React from 'react'; import { motion } from 'framer-motion'; import { Box, VStack, HStack, Heading, Text, Icon, Code, useColorModeValue } from '@chakra-ui/react'; import { HelpCircle } from 'lucide-react'; export function Instructions() { const bgColor = useColorModeValue('yellow.50', 'yellow.900'); const borderColor = useColorModeValue('yellow.200', 'yellow.700'); return ( 📖 How to Use 🎯 Getting Started: • The app automatically detects and loads available flashcard sets • Click on any file in the "Available Flashcard Sets" section to load it • Use the "Change Set" button to switch between different sets 📤 Adding New Content: • Convert your PDF using the command-line tool: python utils/pdf_converter.py your_file.pdf • Upload the generated JSON file using the upload section • The new set will appear in your available files list 📁 Manual Setup (Already have JSON files): • Copy your JSON files directly to the flashcard-data folder: cp your_flashcards.json public/flashcard-data/ • Add set information to the metadata file: python utils/add_flashcard_set.py your_flashcards.json "Set Title" "Description" "Category" "Difficulty" • Refresh the app to see your new flashcard set 📋 JSON Format Required: Your JSON file must have this structure: {`{ "flashcards": [ { "question": "Your question here?", "answer": "Your answer here", "question_number": 1, "format": "multiple_choice" } ] }`} ); }
